answerText: HIV [or Human Immunodeficiency Virus][10] This drug for delaying the replication of HIV was a major breakthrough in HIV/AIDS treatment in the 1990s. This was the first nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor put on the market.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Wellesley + Hunter  | 9 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Envelope glycoprotein gp120 is necessary in the binding of this virus to its target cell. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this lentivirus that causes AIDS.
